short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Aighlight is a chrome-extension highlights plain texts utilizing NLP(Natural Language Processing) AI technology

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reimagine reading with Ai

Tired of reading plain texts all day? Do you find yourself your reading speed (or capacity) isn’t good enough? We were having a same problem when it comes to reading all kinds of texts online (stock market news, Medium, tech blogs, papers…etc.) Those plain texts were refraining us from focus-read, eventually read only titles and slip away.  
- Why can’t we read a blog that’s full of texts but valuable information immersive enough?  
- Why can’t we read better with current english skills?  
- Why can’t we focus more and make ourself easy to read those texts?  
- Why can’t we remember i read and encode it easily to a long-term-memory?  

With help of Ai technology *Aighlight* can ramp-up one's reading capacity to get more important data from the long, large texts with more focused state.
